trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SEQ_00<tab>Serendipity has a new task for you.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SEQ_01<tab>Your next lesson requires that you craft three copper gorgets, for which you will need several copper ingots. Craft and deliver the gorgets to Serendipity.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SEQ_02<tab>Yet again your craftsmanship satisfies Serendipity, and yet again Gigi sees nothing worthy of praise. As a reward for your efforts, the guildmaster gives you a grinding wheel, which will aid you in your future goldsmithing endeavors.
※The next goldsmith quest will be available from Serendipity upon reaching level 10.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_TODO_00<tab>Deliver copper gorgets to Serendipity.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_1<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm honestly a bit surprised to see you─most newcomers find Gigi's evaluations so harsh that we never hear from them again.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_2<tab>I'm so glad that you didn't take him seriously when he said your copper wasn't fit for a chamber pot. I mean, really, it doesn't even make sense─you could make a chamber pot out of <var 1A 02 /var>anything<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_3<tab>Anyway, I hope you've been working hard, because your next task won't be nearly as easy as the last!
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_4<tab>Listen well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I want you to make me three copper gorgets.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_5<tab>For this, you'll need copper ingots, which you very conveniently learned to make last time.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_7<tab>Now, I directed you to purchase ore from Aistan before, but there are other ways to obtain it.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_8<tab>You could dig it up yourself, or perhaps befriend a lonely miner and convince him to share some with you.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_9<tab>However you choose to obtain your materials, I'm sure you'll put them to good use.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_10<tab>Are the gorgets ready yet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Don't keep me waiting too long!
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_11<tab>Hmmm... Well, in my opinion─
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_GIGI_000_12<tab>NE※GIGIGI★※... GoRgEtS...yOuR gOrGeTs ArE gOrGeOuS, gReEnHoRn. Oh WaIt, I mEaNt GrOtEsQuE. uNgOdLy. An AfFrOnT tO tHe GoDs ThEmSeLvEs. FoR sHaMe.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_14<tab>Beg your pardon, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm afraid that constructive criticism isn't one of Gigi's strong points.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_15<tab>But where was I? Ah, yes. Your gorgets are well made─strong and functional.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_16<tab>And that's the least they should be, as they're meant to protect one's throat.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_17<tab>When it comes to basic pieces like these, we don't have much creative freedom. Still, this doesn't mean we should put in less effort─especially since the techniques used to craft simple accessories are the same ones used to craft elaborate ones.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_18<tab>Now then, you've learned how to handle your hammer, but there's another tool I'd like you to get acquainted with.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_19<tab>With this grinding wheel, you'll find it easier to add the finishing touches when you craft. Try using it, and you'll see what I mean.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SERENDIPITY_000_20<tab>Keep your nose to that grinding wheel, and you'll be ready for your next challenge in no time at all.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SYSTEM_000_21<tab>Certain gear grants bonuses to your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>craftsmanship<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>control<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>CP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> values.

TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>A higher craftsmanship rating hastens the progress of synthesis; greater control increases the chance of creating high-quality items; and additional CP improves your crafting stamina.
TEXT_CLSGLD050_00611_SYSTEM_000_23<tab>Outfitting yourself with an eye to your current objective will increase the efficiency of your crafting endeavors.
